locations.description: A dense forest with tall trees and abundant wildlife.
Lush grasslands teeming with wildflowers and gentle breezes.
Open plains with scattered shrubs and rolling fields.
A vast steppe with rolling hills and sparse vegetation.
A dry savanna with acacia trees and roaming wildlife.
A scorching desert with endless dunes and little life.
Rugged mountains with steep cliffs and rocky paths.
A flowing river with clear water and fertile banks.
